name: Basic
description: Ideal for new instructors dipping their toes into online teaching. The Basic Tier provides the essential tools you need to start sharing your knowledge and growing your audience at no initial cost.
title: Begin Your Journey

name: Professional
description: Designed for experienced educators looking to scale their impact. The Professional Tier offers advanced features to enhance student engagement, streamline course management, and maximize your earning potential.
title: Expand Your Reach

name: Enterprise
description: The ultimate package for institutions and high-volume educators. The Enterprise Tier provides comprehensive tools for course creation, student management, and engagement, alongside personalized support to meet your educational objectives.
title: Transform Education
